name: Space Traffic Control
description:
Space Traffic Control is a Traffic Control where you manage Space Ships and making sure that they don't collide by course correcting them. (Note: This is not based on real science whatsoever and there was no heavy research or thinking is done on how  an actual space traffic control might  look like in the future. )

Another Note is this game is just a prototype so I apologize if the game looks awful and there might be some bugs here and there. I might develop it in to something bigger in the future, if people likes the concept, and I might make it 3D and develop some sort of plot into the game and add additional game mechanics as well like space ships need to get clearances to leave or get into the space control zone, player will need to be wary of space debris, guide some space ship to space ports (e.g. Space Station) etc. etc.

Donations will be appreciated but really not needed :)
